# Issue description

What happened? A concise description of the issue.

# Reproduction steps

1. Go to '...'
2. Interact with '...'
3. Place '...'
4. See error

# Screenshots / Videos

Did you capture any video or pictures showing the issue in action?

What version of the game and the mod were you using? What about its dependencies?
